pullRequest.title: feat: Support Comparisons on complex types
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
This PR fixes #4770 Support Comparisons on complex types
Testing done
mvn clean package
Reviewer checklist

 Ensure docs are updated if necessary. (eg. if a user visible feature is being added or changed).
 Ensure relevant issues are linked (description should include text like "Fixes #")

commit.message: feat: Support Comparisons on complex types

nodes.bodyText: is there any reason to convert to an array? I believe we could just use List#equals
can you add tests for nested data types? I'm not entirely sure what happens in that case (e.g. an array of structs, or a struct with a nested struct/array)

These all need to handle Type.IS_DISTINCT_FROM as well.
This also suggests you're missing QTT test cases covering IS NOT DISTINCT FROM and IS DISTINCT FROM for these three complex types.

Likewise, add similar style tests covering IS DISTINCT FROM and IS NOT DISTINCT FROM.
See https://modern-sql.com/feature/is-distinct-from for how they should work with nulls.

commit.message: feat: Support Comparisons on complex types 2

nodes.bodyText: nit: can we put all of these into a method so that we can repeat it below? (e.g. isEqualityOperator(operator)) if we do that we might even be able to dismiss the checkstyle suppressions
we should still check that comparisons fail that should fail (e.g. > and <)
thanks for updating these tests too! we'll need to regenerate the historical plans. you can do this by running PlannedTestGeneratorTest (and uncomment @Ignore)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -6,31 +6,31 @@
     {
       "name": "equals",
       "statements": [
-        "CREATE STREAM INPUT (A INT KEY, B BOOLEAN, C BIGINT, D DOUBLE, E DECIMAL(4,3), F STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');",
-        "CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT A, A = 1, B = true, C = 11, D = 1.1, E = 1.20, F = 'foo' FROM INPUT;"
+        "CREATE STREAM INPUT (A INT KEY, B BOOLEAN, C BIGINT, D DOUBLE, E DECIMAL(4,3), F STRING, G ARRAY<INT>, H MAP<STRING, INT>, I STRUCT<ID INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');",

commit.message: feat: Support Comparisons on complex types 3
feat: Support Comparisons on complex types 3
